required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dapagliflozin Efficacy and Action in PCOS
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of Dapagliflozin in Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: a Multicentre, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

clinical_study.source: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of dapagliflozin on improving insulin resistance and hyperandrogenemia in obesity women with polycystic ovary syndrome.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Improvement in insulin resistance over 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Change in insulin resistance assessed by insulin sensitivity index(HOMA-IR)

primary_outcome.measure: Improvement in serum androgen level over 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Change in androgen level assessed by free testosterone index(FAI)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in AUC (area under a curve) of glucose and insulin during the oral glucose tolerant test (OGTT)
Change in serum sex hormone binding globulin(SHBG)
Net change in total testosterone (TT) level
Net change in luteinzing hormone(LH) level

secondary_outcome.description: Liver fat will be assessed by liver fibroscan.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in ovulation rate assessed by serum progesterone

arm_group.description: Dapagliflozin (Participants will receive dapagliflozin 10mg po qd).
Placebo (Participants will receive placebo po qd)

intervention.description: Participants will receive dapagliflozin 10mg po qd. Additionally, participants will receive lifestyle modification and nutrition education.
Participants will receive placebo po qd. Additionally, participants will receive lifestyle modification and nutrition education.

facility.name: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University
